templateDef.name: Generic Event
templateDef.desc: Generic event to watch to send data..

templateDef.name: Azure connection string
templateDef.desc: Enter the connection string for a policy with 'iothubowner' rights.

templateDef.name: Activity timeout
templateDef.desc: If there is no activity, close the Azure device connection after this timeout.

triggers.name: {{.generic_event}} - Send to Azure IoT
triggers.def:
azure_iot.send('azure_iothub', event.endpoint.key, event.data.data);
azure_iot.twin_update('azure_iothub', event.endpoint.key, {name: event.data.data});
